snippet: The 18-room Hôtel Providence is a fashionable resting spot in one of the most dynamic neighborhoods of Paris, the 10th Arrondissement....

headline.main: A Stylish Base in Paris for Exploring the Right Bank

lead_paragraph: The 18-room Hôtel Providence is a fashionable resting spot in one of the most dynamic neighborhoods of Paris, the 10th Arrondissement.
